div.h3: Welcome to our district web site.
div.p:
Central Decatur Community School District is located in the county seat community of Leon, Iowa. Decatur County and the city of Leon are approximately 1 hour south of Des Moines. Although the CD schools are located in Leon, the district comprises students from many towns. These include Decatur City, Grand River, Davis City, and Pleasanton. The district covers over 60% of Decatur County. Our schools have been recently updated to provide an academic environment ready for the new millennium.
Use the menu at the top of the page to navigate your way through the website. If you have questions, please email web.master@centraldecatur.org.
Join us on social media at:
As a parent of a student at Central Decatur Schools, there is a lot information available at your fingertips.
Central Decatur Schools take great pride in their committed, high-quality staff. For a list of our staff members, click the link below.
The city of Leon is the county seat of Decatur County, Iowa. Leon is conveniently positioned along Highway 69 and Highway 2.
